plot: Fame-seekers across America will post talent reels online, recruit votes and try to win a chance to come to Hollywood for their big shot.
plot_en: Fame-seekers across America will post talent reels online, recruit votes and try to win a chance to come to Hollywood for their big shot.
plot_es: Fame-seekers across America will post talent reels online, recruit votes and try to win a chance to come to Hollywood for their big shot.
title: Big Shot Live
